Case Study - Welcome Description.lang:
<sentence>
    Language files on steriods for
    <either>
        <this>UIs</this>
        <or>apps</or>
        <or>web apps</or>
        <or>websites</or>
        <or>forms</or>
        <or>bots</or>
    </either>
    that
    <either>
        <this>aren't</this>
        <or>are not</or>
        <or id="direct-negative">
            don't
            <maybe>want to</maybe>
            <either>
                <this>seem</this>
                <this>get</this>
                <or>become</or>
                <or>be perceived as</or>
            </either>
        </or>
    </either>
    <either>
        <this>boring</this>
        <or>uninteresting</or>
        <or>repetitive</or>
        <or>monotonous</or>
        <or>dull</or>
    </either>
    <if condition="#direct-negative">
        <then>
            <either>
                <this>over time</this>
                <or>
                    <text id="after">
                        after
                        <either>
                            <this>a while</this>
                            <or>some time</or>
                            <or>the first time</or>
                            <or>a few times</or>
                        </either>
                    </text>
                </or>
                <or>
                    in
                    <either>
                        <this>a day</this>
                        <or>a week</or>
                        <or>a month</or>
                    </either>
                </or>
            </either>
        </then>
        <else>
            <ref id="after"/>
        </else>
    </if>
</sentence>

Compound If Condition.lang:
<sentence>
    <text>
        <if condition="female & married">Mrs.</if>
        <if condition="female & !married">Ms.</if>
        <if condition="!female">Mr.</if>
    </text>
    <data key="last_name|first_name" />
    likes Trains.
</sentence>

    <either>

    She likes watching the
    <if condition="#air">clouds below her.</if>
    <if condition="#rail">country side around her.</if>
</sentence>
